Boneless Chicken (cut into strips) 300 gms 

Capsicum (cut into strips) 1 pc 

Onion (cut into strips) 1 medium size 

Tomato (cut into strips) 2 pcs 

Cooking Oil 4 tbsp 

Water 3 cups 

Corn Flour 2 tbsp 

Garlic chopped 1 tbss 

Bake Parlor Spaghetti, Bake parlor Masala Mixed Sachet (inside the packet)

1. Boil Bake Parlor Spaghetti in boiling salted water for 5-7 minutes or cook till tender but still firm to the bite. 

2. Drain and rinse under cold running water. 

3. Mix 1 tbsp of oil and set aside. 

4. Heat oil in a pan, add garlic and fry for a minute. 

5. Add chicken and fry for 3 minutes. 

6. Add bake parlor spice Mix sachet and fry for a minute. 

7. Mix corn flour in water and pour it in the pan while constantly mixing. 

8. Add capsicum, onion and cook for a minute. 

9. Now add strips of tomatoes and toss all the ingredients with Bake Parlor Spaghetti. 

10. Serve hot.
